posts.post_content:
I recently bought a small T206 collection about 45 cards and thought I would start by listing a few here first. All have nice eye appeal. 

Patsy Dougherty Piedmont 350 Sold
Bill Dahlen Piedmont 150 Sold
Germany Schaefer Piedmont 150 Sold
Heinie Zimmermann Sweet Cap 350 Sold

All are PSA 4 and looking for $75.00 shipped each or take them all for $280.00. Paypal Accepted or money order.

Thanks Daryl
All Cards have been sold. Thanks Rob and Shawn
